Room.Name: Clerical Supply Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small supply room where you may purchase limited supplies.
Room.LongDescription: As you look around, you realize this place is exactly what the name says. There are bibles, hymnals, prayer shawls, strings of beads, icons and and a variety of cassocks and albs on hangers. A small silver keg appears to hold ceremonial wine, and there are a lot of small silver cups nearby. Looks like the acolytes have been drinking the wine. Ask the acolyte for a selection. (type: selection acolyte)
